Name: 七彩航行 Colorful Trip
About the game: ColorfulTrip is a 2D flight game. There will be enemies of various colors trying to approach and destroy you. You can control the color of the plane you are flying, and use the three primary colors to transform yourself into the same color as the enemy and destroy them. Each game level is random, and each game is a different challenge
